projectPurpose: To provide an interactive, user-friendly command-line interface for exploring, viewing, and filtering JSON data using jq expressions.
mainFeatures: Interactive JSON viewer and jq filter editor
Uses jaq for applying jq filters (no separate jq needed)
Supports various input formats (file, stdin, JSON Lines)

alternatives.name: jq
mainFeatures: Powerful functional language for JSON transformation
Slice, filter, map, and transform structured data

marketPositioning: jnv positions itself as an interactive, terminal-based tool that simplifies the process of filtering and exploring JSON data by providing a live viewer and jq editor. It leverages the power of the widely used jq language but enhances the user experience with an intuitive interface, differentiating itself from the standard command-line jq utility and offering a jq-centric alternative to more general data exploration tools like VisiData or JavaScript-based tools like fx.
